pages.md:
# Exposure Preview

To preview exposure in the LCD monitor, select an option other than **OFF** for:

**SCREEN SET-UP > PREVIEW EXP./WB IN MANUAL MODE.**

!Exposure Preview Example

- Select **OFF** when using the flash or on other occasions on which exposure may change when the picture is taken.
